gate.gui

Interface ResizableVisualResource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FeatureBearer, NameBearer, Resource, Serializable, VisualResource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FeaturesSchemaEditor, OntologyEditor

    public interface ResizableVisualResource
extends VisualResource
    This interface denotes visual resources that can be resized.
